POINTCODE=#{pointCode} AND ALARMCODE=#{alarmCode} AND POLLUTECODE=#{polluteCode} AND STARTTIME=#{startTime} AND DATATYPE=#{dataType}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_BAS_ALMINFO ( POINTCODE, ALARMCODE, DATATYPE, POLLUTECODE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, ALARMSTATUS, ALARMVALUE, ISSHIELDING, ISONLINE ) values( #{pointCode,jdbcType=INTEGER }, #{alarmCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{polluteCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmValue,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{isShielded,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isOnline,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.select: SELECT p.POINTCODE, STARTDATE AS bDateTime, ENDDATE AS eDateTime FROM T_PS_PMS_EXCEPTION_APP e, T_PS_PMS_EXCEPTION_APP_PLIST p WHERE e.APPID = p.APPID AND e.APPLY_STATUS = 1 and e.ISSUPPLEMENT=0 ORDER BY STARTDATE ASC,ENDDATE ASC
SELECT pointCode, [WEEK], ISNULL(STARTTIME,'00:00:00') AS startTime, ISNULL(ENDTIME,'23:59:59') AS endTime FROM T_PS_PMS_REGULARSTOPTIME ORDER BY STARTTIME ASC,ENDTIME ASC

SELECT A.POINTCODE, A.ALARMCODE, A.POLLUTECODE, A.DATATYPE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, ALARMSTATUS, ALARMVALUE, ISSHIELDING, ISONLINE, ISGENALARM FROM T_BAS_ALMINFO A, T_BAS_ALM_RULE_INFO R WHERE A.ALARMCODE = R.ALARMCODE AND R.ISEFFECT = 1 AND A.DATATYPE = R.DATATYPE AND ENDTIME IS NOT NULL AND NOT (starttime > #{endTime} OR ISNULL(endtime,GETDATE()) < #{beginTime})

SELECT A.POINTCODE, A.ALARMCODE, A.POLLUTECODE, A.DATATYPE, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, ALARMSTATUS, ALARMVALUE, ISSHIELDING, ISONLINE FROM T_BAS_ALMINFO A, T_BAS_ALM_DEF B WHERE A.ALARMCODE = B.ALARMCODE AND A.ISPUSH = 0 AND starttime < #{beginTime} AND (B.ALMTYPEID = 1 OR B.ALMTYPEID = 2 OR B.ALMTYPEID = 33)
